statements: DELETE FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_id = 100 AND property_name = 'Luxury Condo';
DELETE FROM RentalProperties WHERE task_id = 500 OR maintenance_request_id = 200;
DELETE FROM management_tasks WHERE task_assigned_to = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 101 AND property_id = 201
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 100 AND request_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM management_tasks WHERE task_id = 10 AND (task_status = 'pending' OR task_status = 'in progress');
